qas.question: In which season was the "Fan Save" first used?
How do people vote using the fan save?
What was introduced in season 14 to allow the fans to help save a contestant?
How do viewers vote for a contestant using Fan Save?
When does the Fan Save start?

context: The "<a2_0>Fan Save<a2_0/>" was introduced in the <a0_0>fourteen<a0_0/>th season. During the finals, viewers are given a five-minute window to vote for the contestants in danger of elimination by using their <a1_0><a3_0>Twitter<a3_0/><a1_0/> account to decide which contestant will move on to the next show, starting with the <a4_0>Top 8<a4_0/>.
